content: too flarey just the right amount of stretch shadow wrap short row ksw knit shadow wrap with right hand needle lift the top of the stitch below the next stitch so the mama of the next stitch onto left hand needle knit the lifted stitch being careful not to twist it slip the new st back onto left needle it will look like 2 sts twin are made from the same stitch this stitch and its shadow will be worked together as one stitch psw purl shadow wrap slip next st onto right hand needle with left hand needle lift the top of the mama st of that stitch you just slipped and purl the lifted st slip both sts twin sts back onto left hand needle this stitch and its shadow will be worked together as one stitch tksw triplet knit shadow wrap work as ksw it will look like 3 sts triplet are made from the same stitch tpsw triplet purl shadow wrap work as psw to form triplet sts here is a link for a good tutorial on shadow wrap short row https //socktopusunplugged wordpress com/2011/02/05/short-row-shadow-wraps/ ©2022 holly isaac for personal use only hollyisaac on ravelry pattern support hollymocha3@gmail com 5
